objects.specification: A durable floor surface with a warm earthy tone, smooth matte finish reminiscent of natural wood or vinyl, providing a sturdy foundation for the classroom environment.
Smooth white interior wall panel with flush surface and clean edges, finished in matte white paint for a bright neutral backdrop.

A larger teacher’s desk with a rectangular wooden tabletop in a warm brown finish, sturdy legs and a modesty panel, decorated with subtle dinosaur-themed engraved fossil patterns along the edges for thematic coherence.
A small cylindrical waste bin molded in durable plastic with a neutral grey finish and open top design for efficient paper disposal.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth glossy white surface and slim aluminum frame, designed for clear writing and erasing during lessons.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with white housing, sleek rectangular body and lens aperture facing the front wall, designed for crisp image projection onto the whiteboard.
